DOC.brief_summary: The primary goal study examine fidelity generalization parent effect KEEP foster parent train intervention deliver within child welfare system care community mental health provider .
DOC.brief_title: Community Implementation KEEP : Fidelity Generalization Parenting
DOC.detailed_description: The primary goal study utilize opportunity real-world platform address three key question need answered prior wide-scale implementation KEEP intervention . First , effect KEEP parent training generalize ( concurrently ) child currently foster kin intervention home lead reduction overall level behavior problem ? Second , KEEP intervention continue effect completion intervention generalize ( temporally ) new child enter home family later point time ? Finally , KEEP intervention implement community agency real-world system care , intervention deliver maintained manner preserve goal quality intervention ? Children foster care , age 5 12 , randomly assign one two condition - KEEP intervention `` service usual '' condition . In KEEP intervention condition , foster kin caregiver participate 16 weekly group meeting . Outcomes assess include child problem behavior ( focal child child household ) , child functioning , parental stress , family functioning , use mental health service , child placement change ( e.g. , reunification biological parent , move another foster home ) , foster parent retention rate . In addition , year follow completion intervention , new child enter home foster/kin caregiver include assessment , along impact additional child parental stress family functioning . Finally , several dimension intervention fidelity ( e.g. , facilitator adherence group engagement ) assess examine relation child , family , system outcome .
DOC.criteria: Any child age 5 12 relative nonrelative foster care Only medically fragile child
